column5: Is there a list available of NW Ontario Lakes and Public Access Locations?

The interactive MNR map tool called fish onlinehttp://www.web2.mnr.gov.on.ca/fish_o...plorer_en.html Will show access points but you need to select that feature on the left hand side of the map. Alternatively you can buy the Crimestopper series maps that cover nw ontario. Kestrelforestry.com should get you there.
Perfect, yep do need to select public access to know if lake has a boat landing. Does Canada do any fish surveys of lakes?
